page.title: 09Tourism-a Survey (Continued)
page.content: campers said they like the relaxed atmosphere of Reculver and also the quiet life. None of them brought pets with them. The most popular daytime activities were fishing,swimming, sunbathing,walking and visiting Herne Bay on Saturday mornings.The most popular evening pastime was drinking in the King Ethelbert pub or the Blue Dolphin clubhouse.Most of the campers liked the facilities at the campsites but many would like an improved bus service to Herne Bay,a swimming pool, more entertainment,improved toilets and showers.
